___categories.description: A list with one entry or engine and extension that ran.

items.description: Contrains the messages produced by this engine or extension.

___formatted.description: Indicates whether the message string should be reproduced verbatim.

$eref.description: Counts of the different message types.

___summary.description: A summary of the run this log pertains to.

___rawLog.description: The path of the raw text log.

___version.description: The version of ltx2any that produced this log.

___counts.description: Counts of the different message types.

___call.description: The CLI call that started this run.

___runs.description: A list of which engines and extentions were run.

___document.description: The path of the document that was compiled by this run.

___workDirectory.description: The directory in which this run was started.
